channel.title: Pk Fast Spawn | Login & PK | Pk Tickets | 24/7 Online
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.pkfast.com/images/tf_ideal/misc/logo.png[/img] [SIZE=3][COLOR=SandyBrown][B][I]Hi everyone, Pk Fast here, I just wanna wish everyone out there the best. I hope you like pking and having fun.[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE] [COLOR=Silver][SIZE=5]Play now at:[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=White][URL=http://www.pkfast.com/][COLOR=White][SIZE=4]www.pkfast.com[/SIZE][/COLOR][/URL][/COLOR] [/CENTER]
[COLOR=Silver][SIZE=4][B]Download:[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR] The desktop client can be downloaded from our website: [URL=http://www.pkfast.com/cmps_index.php?pageid=DownloadClient][SIZE=3][COLOR=White]Download Now[/COLOR][/SIZE][/URL]
[COLOR=Silver][SIZE=4][B]Features:[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]
[ul][*]Login, chose between various classes, including: Master, Pure, Tanker, Zerker, etc... [*] ::item, ::spawn. ([COLOR=Red]not everything's spawnable..[/COLOR]). [*]Flawless Pk ticket system, very very hard to bypass it. [*]Various Pk ticket shop, including barrows armor. [*]Fully working Full Screen, Resizeable and Fixed. [*]Test your skills before going Pking at ::funpk. [*]Fully working summoning skill + summoning familiar. [*]Hosted on a dedicated server - online 24/7 [*]Flawless combat system - perfect timing, animations and calculations [*]Battle in the wilderness with hundreds of players [*]Several minigames, including Dh FFA, barrows, jad and much more. [*]Regular content updates. [*]19 skills fully working - including fishing, cooking, slayer, crafting, herblore, mining, smithing, fletching and woodcutting for skillers. [*]And much more!!.[/ul]
[CENTER] [COLOR=Silver][SIZE=4][B]Media:[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=yellow]Home:[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/r97sjW4.png[/img] [COLOR=yellow]Starter Interface:[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lGbb1c1.png[/img] [COLOR=yellow]How To Play:[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/x28P3qy.png[/img] [COLOR=yellow]Spawn Menu if you don't wanna type ::item manually.[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/N00Spaz.png[/img] [COLOR=yellow]Pk:[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tQm2j26.png[/img] [COLOR=yellow]Pk:[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/O5jD4En.png[/img] [COLOR=yellow]Get your whip and dbows:[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tBB9Kkx.png[/img] [COLOR=Yellow]Summoning:[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aQY0Ptq.png[/img]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=White]Start your adventure today:[/COLOR][/SIZE] [COLOR=Silver][SIZE=3]Play now at:[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=White][URL=http://www.pkfast.com/][COLOR=White][SIZE=4]www.pkfast.com[/SIZE][/COLOR][/URL][/COLOR]
[SIZE=3][COLOR=White]Comments, questions, or constructive criticism?:[/COLOR][/SIZE] Feel free to post them in this thread and we'll do our best to help you out![/CENTER]

[CENTER]

[ul][]Login, chose between various classes, including: Master, Pure, Tanker, Zerker, etc…
[] ::item, ::spawn. ([COLOR=Red]not everything’s spawnable…[/COLOR]).
[]Flawless Pk ticket system, very very hard to bypass it.
[]Various Pk ticket shop, including barrows armor.
[]Fully working Full Screen, Resizeable and Fixed.
[]Test your skills before going Pking at ::funpk.
[]Fully working summoning skill + summoning familiar.
[]Hosted on a dedicated server - online 24/7
[]Flawless combat system - perfect timing, animations and calculations
[]Battle in the wilderness with hundreds of players
[]Several minigames, including Dh FFA, barrows, jad and much more.
[]Regular content updates.
[]19 skills fully working - including fishing, cooking, slayer, crafting, herblore, mining, smithing, fletching and woodcutting for skillers.
[]And much more!!.[/ul]
